mapper.sql: id, serviceId, pwId, serviceType, name, aXcId, zXcId, activeStatus, rootSite, branchSite, aAcId, zAcId, createUser, createTime, aSiteId, zSiteId, isSingle, cestype, jobstatus, clientId, branchMainSite, branchProtectSite, zmostAcIds, amostAcIds,activatingTime
mapper.select: select * from serviceinfo s where serviceType=1 and (s.asiteId=#{aSiteId} or s.zsiteId=#{aSiteId})

mapper.update:
update serviceinfo
serviceId = #{serviceid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pwId = #{pwid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
serviceType = #{servicetype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
aXcId = #{axcid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
zXcId = #{zxcid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
activeStatus = #{activestatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
rootSite = #{rootsite,jdbcType=INTEGER},
branchSite = #{branchsite,jdbcType=INTEGER},
aAcId = #{aacid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
zAcId = #{zacid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createUser = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
aSiteId = #{asiteid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
zSiteId = #{zsiteid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
isSingle = #{issingle,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cestype = #{cestype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
jobstatus = #{jobstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
clientId = #{clientid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
branchMainSite = #{branchmainsite,jdbcType=INTEGER},
branchProtectSite = #{branchprotectsite,jdbcType=INTEGER},
zmostAcIds = #{zmostacids,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
amostAcIds = #{amostacids,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update serviceinfo set serviceId = #{serviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pwId = #{pwId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, serviceType = #{serviceType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, aXcId = #{aXcId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, zXcId = #{zXcId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, activeStatus = #{activeStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, aAcId = #{aAcId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, zAcId = #{zAcId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createUser = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, aSiteId = #{aSiteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, zSiteId = #{zSiteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, isSingle = #{isSingle,jdbcType=INTEGER}, jobstatus = #{jobStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, clientId = #{clientId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, activatingTime = #{activatingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from serviceinfo s where serviceType=1 and (s.asiteId=#{aSiteId} or s.zsiteId=#{aSiteId})
select * from serviceinfo where serviceType = 1 and isSingle=#{1} and (aSiteId = #{0} or zSiteId = #{0})
select*from serviceinfo where serviceType=1 and ((aAcId= #{0} and aSiteId = #{1} )or (zAcId = #{0} and zSiteId=#{1}))
select * from serviceinfo where serviceType=1 and ((asiteid=#{siteId} and axcid=#{serviceId}) or (zsiteid=#{siteId} and zxcid=#{serviceId}))
select * from serviceinfo where serviceType=1 and ((asiteid=#{0} and aXcId != 0)or (zsiteid=#{0} and zXcId != 0))
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO serviceinfo ( serviceId, pwId, serviceType, NAME, aXcId, zXcId, activeStatus, rootSite, branchSite, aAcId, zAcId, createUser, createTime, aSiteId, zSiteId, isSingle, cestype, clientId) SELECT s1.serviceId, s1.pwId, s1.serviceType, concat( eline_#(0)) NAME, s1.aXcId, s2.zXcId, s1.activeStatus, s1.rootSite, s1.branchSite, s1.aAcId, s2.zAcId, s1.createUser, now() createTime, s1.aSiteId, s2.zSiteId, 0, s1.cestype, 0 FROM serviceinfo s1 ,serviceinfo s2 WHERE s1.id =#{1} and s2.id =#{2}
mapper.delete: delete s from serviceinfo s where isSingle=1 and serviceType=1 and id in #{0}

update.if: update serviceinfo set activeStatus=#{status} where serviceType=#{type} and (rootSite = #{siteId} or branchMainSite = #{siteId} or branchProtectSite = #{siteId})
update serviceinfo set activeStatus=#{status} where serviceType=#{type} and (aSiteId = #{siteId} or zSiteId = #{siteId})

mapper.select: select * from serviceinfo where serviceType=1 and ((asiteid=#{0} and axcid=#{1}) or (zsiteid=#{0} and zxcid=#{1}))
select count(*) from serviceinfo where (serviceType = 2 or serviceType = 3 or serviceType = 40) and pwId = #{0}
select count(*) from serviceinfo where (serviceType = 40) and (aAcId = #{0} or zAcId = #{0})

select * from serviceinfo where (serviceType = 2 or serviceType = 3)
and (amostAcIds like #{acId} or zmostAcIds like #{acId})

SELECT * from serviceinfo where serviceType=1 and pwId in
#{item}
SELECT * FROM serviceinfo WHERE pwId = #{0} and serviceType = 1

update.if: update serviceinfo set activeStatus=#{status} where serviceType=1

update serviceinfo set activeStatus=#{status} where id in
#{item}

mapper.select: SELECT serviceType FROM serviceinfo WHERE id = #{0}
